title: Buying pixel 3a in USA...and shifting to India forever...will it accept indian sim cards(vodafone)
content:
Hey guys,
Planning to buy a pixel 3a in USA...and I am soon going to shift to India.. .wanted to check a few things. Any help is appreciated.
1. Is pixel 3a available in international unlocked version?
2. Can I use vodafone sim card(Indian vodafone sim card) after I travel to India?

Thanks,
